# @babel/plugin-transform-modules-umd

> This plugin transforms ES2015 modules to UMD

## Install

Using npm:

```sh
npm install --save-dev @babel/plugin-transform-modules-umd
```

or using yarn:

```sh
yarn add @babel/plugin-transform-modules-umd --dev
```
